thread.title: Upcoming Exclusive Choi Siwon on His New Drama ‘She Was Pretty’
thread.title_full: Upcoming Exclusive Choi Siwon on His New Drama ‘She Was Pretty’

title: Upcoming Exclusive Choi Siwon on His New Drama ‘She Was Pretty’
text:
Upcoming Exclusive: Choi Siwon on His New Drama ‘She Was Pretty’ 
Epoch Times Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Followed by millions of fans around the world, the charming actor Choi Siwon is Hallyu World’s latest guest. Stay tuned for the full exclusive interview along the scenic Hangang River. 
Korean drama ';';?is a great romantic comedy about?two past acquaintances who meet again after they’ve gone through a reversal of fortunes and appearances, set in the backdrop of a fashion magazine’s publishing office. 
Kim Hye-jin was a very pretty girl from a rich family. After her family’s publishing company went bankrupt, she experienced hardships and then lost her beauty too....
